subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Matt Harvey, the Mets’ ace, is 0-1 with a 3.52 earned run average in four starts against the Marlins this season. In his latest, he lasted only five and two-thirds innings.
snippet: Matt Harvey, the Mets’ ace, is 0-1 with a 3.52 earned run average in four starts against the Marlins this season. In his latest, he lasted only five and two-thirds innings.
